import { Form } from 'formik' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' function FormRadio() { const [input,setInput]=useState({ firstname:'', lastname:'', phone:'', email:'' }) const handlechange =(e)=>{ console.log(e.target.value) setInput((prev)=>({...prev,[e.target.name]:e.target.value})) } return (
firstname lastname



) } export default FormRadio
